column5: Interesting little camp that someone is advertising with us... price sure is right!!  http://ontarioresortsforsale.net/37.html  Needs some work... but wow....  Lots of older camps coming on the market.
Geez TJ, when I saw your thread title I thought you were getting rid of Jiggy Jiggy
No way... theres gotta be a place they can hide me when im old... lol

Good bang for your buck!   I checked it out on google maps and the only Pot Lake that came up was about 50 k above Halfway Lake PP north of Sudbury.  Could not find one north of Thessalon?  Perhaps you should add long and latt!  lol. Dream camp for sure!
The area and property is great.  To many buildings to maintain though!!  No time to relax.
If it were closer to Toronto I'd buy it and start up my dream.  I've always wanted to make a summer camp for underprivileged kids to teach them fishing, boating, and how to respect nature.
